text: Bere a Usia babarima Yotam babarima Ahas7.1 Ɛbɛyɛ afe 735 AWK mu no, Israel ne Siria ka bɔɔ mu tiaa Asiria, na wɔpɛɛ sɛ wɔhyɛ Ahas a na ɔyɛ Yuda hempɔn no na ɔne wɔn bɔ mu kɔko. bedii Yudaman so hene no, Aramhene Resin ne Remalia babarima Peka a ɔyɛ Israelhene baa Yerusalem ne wɔn bɛkoe, nanso wɔantumi anni ne so.
